## create() function

Creates a buffer containing an ID3 Tag and returns it.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function create(tags: WriteTags): Buffer;
```

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  tags | [WriteTags](./node-id3.writetags.md) |  |

**Returns:**
